description:
Someone has to take care of their vehicles while they’re enjoing their time off. That someone is you!

GAME FEATURES
▶ IMPRESSIVE CAR COLLECTION: Drive 10 Awesome Cars
▶ PRO PARKING MISSIONS: Huge campaign to beat, earn in-game money for your progress
▶ AWESOME GRAPHICS: Immersive polished visuals
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view for full immersion

The game features 10 amazing vehicles. Every true car enthusiast will find something for themselves here. But enjoying the cars’ looks and performance is only the beginning.

To prove yourself worthy of these incredible machines you will have to complete multiple tasks, navigate tricky obstacle courses and show that you are able to drive not only fast but also safely.

Choose from 10 top quality cars. You will get to drive a muscle car, a sports cabrio, an SUV and to make things interesting - even a golf cart! Each one controls a bit differently. Learn to get the most of them!

Drive around meticulously crafted club area. Complete obstacle courses, drive around and between buildings, even have a little ride ocean side! Interesting and varied environments will help you stay engaged in your driving.
name: Car Parking Club
